FuncDef: This command specifies the month when the event should be executed. Multiple months can be specified. When multiple months are configured, each of them will cause the schedule to trigger. If a month is configured without configuringweekday,day-of-month,hourandminute, the event will not execute.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a month number. Values-1 to 12 (maximum 12 month-numbers).
Specifies a month by name. Values-january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december (maximum 12 month names).
